definition: to grant/to give/to bestow/to act/to carry out
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: Holly Chan is a member of Oxfam's Archipelagic Southeast Asia team.
sentences.chinese: 陳一舫爲樂施會東亞項目組職員。
樂施會，這是一個國際組織。

sentences.english: Brenda Lee, a staff member of Oxfam Hong Kong, recently visited Nepal on a documentation trip.
sentences.chinese: 李冰心爲樂施會職員，最近探訪尼泊爾以作文件紀錄。

sentences.english: Gan Ning is the Chief Executive of the Lighthouse Project, a non-governmental organisation based in Guangzhou.
sentences.chinese: 爲非政府組織，以廣州基地，獲得樂施會支持。
樂施會毅行者每年何時舉行？

sentences.english: Stephanie Cheung is a member of the Policy, Campaigns and Communications Unit of Oxfam Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 張亦敏爲樂施會政策倡議及傳訊部職員。

sentences.english: Based in Beijing, Xue Zhenbing is an Events Officer with Oxfam Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 薛振冰爲樂施會北京辦事處的活動幹事。

sentences.english: The last week of September 2009 was very busy for Oxfam.
sentences.chinese: 2009年9月最後一個星期，樂施會忙得不可開交。

sentences.english: Oxfam Hong Kong has been supporting ACORD for over a decade.
sentences.chinese: 樂施會已支援該組織超過十年。

sentences.english: I imagine you've heard of Oxfam.
Oxfam Hong Kong's support includes financial assistance and training in project management.
sentences.chinese: 樂施會的支援包括財政援助及項目管理培訓。

sentences.english: Oxfam support migrant workers through training in job-related skills.
sentences.chinese: 樂施會支援到城裏打工的民工，爲他們提供職業培訓。

sentences.english: Oxfam has provided funds for emergency and rehabilitation work.
sentences.chinese: 樂施會已提供緊急援助金。

definition: UNESCO, United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization

pinyin: Lian2 he2 guo2 Er2 tong2 Ji1 jin1 hui4

definition: Salvation Army (protestant philanthropic organization founded in London in 1865)
different mouths, same voice/to speak in unison (idiom)

definition: Tung Wah Group of Hospitals (Hong Kong)
